Package org.example.unogame.model.exception

Class GameException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
org.example.unogame.model.exception.GameException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameException.EmptyTableException, GameException.GameEndedException, GameException.IllegalCardColor, GameException.IllegalCardValue, GameException.InvalidCardIndex, GameException.NullCardException, GameException.NullPlayerException, GameException.OutOfCardsInDeck, GameException.ThreadInitializationException, GameException.ThreadInterruptedException
public class GameException extends Exception
Base checked exception type for UNO gameâ€“specific errors.

All domain exceptions thrown by the model layer should extend this class. Nested static subclasses represent common error categories (deck depletion, illegal card attributes, invalid indices, etc.).

Usage

  • Throw specific nested subclasses when possible (e.g., GameException.OutOfCardsInDeck).
  • Use GameException itself for generic or unexpected error states that do not fit a dedicated subtype.
See Also:

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    GameException.EmptyTableException
    Thrown when accessing the top card on the table but there are no cards placed.
    static class 
    GameException.GameEndedException
    Thrown when an action is attempted after the game has already ended.
    static class 
    GameException.IllegalCardColor
    Thrown when a card has an illegal or unexpected color.
    static class 
    GameException.IllegalCardValue
    Thrown when a card has an illegal or unexpected value.
    static class 
    GameException.InvalidCardIndex
    Thrown when attempting to access a card in a hand using an invalid index.
    static class 
    GameException.NullCardException
    Thrown when a null Card is encountered where a valid instance is required.
    static class 
    GameException.NullPlayerException
    Thrown when a required player reference is missing or null.
    static class 
    GameException.OutOfCardsInDeck
    Thrown when the deck runs out of cards and a draw is attempted.
    static class 
    GameException.ThreadInitializationException
    Thrown when a thread required by the game cannot be created or prepared correctly.
    static class 
    GameException.ThreadInterruptedException
    Wraps an InterruptedException or similar interruption during thread operations within the game model or controller logic.
